name: ClientHouse
tagline: Transforming your Business into Cloud Technology!
description:
ClientHouse is a leading consultancy for CRM and Cloud Computing providing wide-ranging services such as strategy consulting, process optimization, software implementation and technology consulting.
Our strong partnerships with salesforce.com and Veeva Systems and expertise in various industries make us a premiere provider for CRM in the cloud. As a cloud computing pioneer ClientHouse completed more than 300 projects in time and budget and has specific experience with international roll-outs in dynamic environments.
With ClientHouse, companies also benefit from the extensive knowledge of the Force.com platform, allowing them to further extend the CRM system to fully meet their business needs.
